name: ManageCO2
tag_list: manageco2, carbon-management, carbon-accounting, carbon-footprint, co2, crc, cdp, eu-ets, ghg, carbon-management-software
overview:
ManageCO2 is a proactive and innovative new software company. At ManageCO2 we are passionate about the Environment, and about using technology to help organisations, both public and private, combat Climate Change. The company was founded in 2009, by Adrian Fleming, Derek Spillane and Roy Meaney, and is now recognised as Ireland’s leading Carbon Management Software provider. Based out of Limerick, Ireland, with offices in Dublin and London England, ManageCO2 are serving the Irish and UK public and private sectors.

The ethos at ManageCO2 is simplicity. We take great pride and put great effort and care into simplifying every step of the Carbon Management process, to allow a pleasurable end user experience. By coupling our easy to use software, with data collection automation, this ethos is clearly reflected in our software as it provides an almost “touchless” Carbon Management platform. ManageCO2 … Making Carbon Management Easy

some very prestigious awards such as the IT@Cork Award 2010 for Clean Technology, and were recently finalists in the Intertrade Ireland regional finals.

With an innovative team, and a growing client base, ManageCO2 plans to position itself among the international leaders in Environmental Management in the coming years.
